entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
